detail_desc: Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Cropped top in crinkled, patterned jersey with a sweetheart neckline and short, trimmed puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with overlocked edges, a seam at the waist with a discreet drawstring at the sides, and seams with a small frill trim and concealed elastication around the skirt to create tiers. Lined.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with overlocked edges, a seam at the waist with a discreet drawstring at the sides, and seams with a small frill trim and concealed elastication around the skirt to create tiers. Lined.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with overlocked edges, a seam at the waist with a discreet drawstring at the sides, and seams with a small frill trim and concealed elastication around the skirt to create tiers. Lined.
Lightweight trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs.
Lightweight trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs.

Sandals in glittery imitation leather with an embroidered appliqué on the foot strap, and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing lights.
Straight-cut shirt in airy cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.

Block-coloured cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif, ribbed stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Long raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shimmering, patterned tankini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that join at the back and a wide flounce at the hem. Bottoms with a lined gusset. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with short legs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with short legs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps. Press-studs at the top and crotch and short legs with narrow ribbed trims.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps. Press-studs at the top and crotch and short legs with narrow ribbed trims.
Fully lined swimsuit with crossover flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Elastication at the top to make the swimsuit easy to put on and take off.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low-cut neckline front and back. Short puff sleeves with wide elastication over the shoulders and narrow elastication at the hems. Seam under the bust and a smocked skirt. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low-cut neckline front and back. Short puff sleeves with wide elastication over the shoulders and narrow elastication at the hems. Seam under the bust and a smocked skirt. Unlined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey fancy dress skirt in the shape of a fishtail with a shimmering metallic scale print. Short at the front and lined inside.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed, foldover polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud.
Cap in cotton twill with a glittery appliqué and embroidered text on the front, a covered button on top and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Cotton sweatband.
Cap in cotton twill with a glittery appliqué and embroidered text on the front, a covered button on top and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Cotton sweatband.
Cap in cotton twill with a glittery appliqué and embroidered text on the front, a covered button on top and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Cotton sweatband.
Sleeveless dress in shimmering, patterned tulle with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with tiers to create width in the skirt. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in shimmering, patterned tulle with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with tiers to create width in the skirt. Lined.
Fully lined sports swimsuit with wide, elastic shoulder straps that meet at the back, a decorative horizontal strap at the back, and high-cut legs.
Satin-covered Alice band with decorative braiding.
Satin-covered Alice band with decorative braiding.
Satin-covered Alice band with decorative braiding.
Fabric-covered hair elastics. Two patterned, three in solid colour.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a pair of dungaree shorts and a T-shirt in soft, organic cotton. Shorts in a crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist and hems and straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Soft cotton poplin lining. T-shirt in ribbed jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Dungaree shorts in cotton twill with buttons at the top, straps with a knot at the front, pockets in the side seams and a back pocket. Unlined.
Hair clips in metal and plastic with a matt finish. Length approx. 7 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Puff shorts in a soft, organic cotton weave with elastication and a twisted drawstring at the waist and narrow elastication around the hems.
Cropped, sleeveless, one-shoulder top in shimmering metallic jersey. One open shoulder and one wide shoulder strap.
Sleeveless top in softly draping satin. Double layer at the top with a draped collar.
Sleeveless top in softly draping satin. Double layer at the top with a draped collar.
Hair clips in metal decorated with faceted plastic beads. Length 6 cm.
Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has a button fastening at one side and decorative buttons at the other. Zip fly and buttons, and straight, wide legs with creases.
Long, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a jersey underskirt.
Zip-through hoodie in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Zip-through hoodie in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, boxy jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Large chest pockets with a flap and button, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a square neckline and long puff sleeves. Gathers at one side to create a draped effect, and a wrapover skirt with a slit at the front. Lined front.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a square neckline and long puff sleeves. Gathers at one side to create a draped effect, and a wrapover skirt with a slit at the front. Lined front.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress with a round neckline, lace top and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt in sturdy jersey. Partly lined at the top in jersey.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress with a round neckline, lace top and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt in sturdy jersey. Partly lined at the top in jersey.
Joggers in lightweight, washed denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Ribbed top in soft jersey made from a mulberry silk and cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Ribbed top in soft jersey made from a mulberry silk and cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
V-neck body in a modal and silk blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs, and medium coverage at the back.
V-neck body in a modal and silk blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs, and medium coverage at the back.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in soft pima cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in soft pima cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.

Set containing eight ear cuffs and four different hoop earrings in metal. Five of the pieces are decorated with sparkly glass beads and two with shimmering plastic pearls. Diameter from 1 cm to 2.5 cm.

Set containing eight ear cuffs and four different hoop earrings in metal. Five of the pieces are decorated with sparkly glass beads and two with shimmering plastic pearls. Diameter from 1 cm to 2.5 cm.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a narrow frill trim down the front of the legs.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in satin made from recycled polyester. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in satin made from recycled polyester. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
